lead_paragraph: OLNICK--Sylvia. The entire Albert Einstein College of Medicine family is profoundly saddened by the loss of our dear friend and devoted benefactor. Sylvia, along with her late husband Robert, endowed a Chair in Neuroscience and a Faculty Scholar in Cancer Research. They believed in the importance of giving back and were generous and steadfast supporters of medical research at Einstein. Sylvia joined our Board of Overseers in 1987 and served until 2015. We already miss her warm and gracious presence and extend our heartfelt sympathy to the entire family. Allen M. Spiegel, M.D, The Marilyn and Stanley M. Katz Dean; Roger W. Einiger Chair, Board of Trustees 1/3
